title: Artificial Intelligence Leading Watershed Moment
itunes:title: Artificial Intelligence Leading Watershed Moment
description:
Eric Schmidt, Co-Founder of Schmidt Futures and former Google CEO and Chairman, discusses his book “The Age of AI: And Our Human Future.”

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
